attributes.action: Stop Facebook Censoring and Over-Sexualising the Female Body - Free the Nipple!
attributes.additional_details: TheNFTitsClub is a charitable NFT project raising money for women around the world to treat illness such as breast cancer, our content contains female breasts (sometimes without the nipple to show the horrid impacts of breast cancer) and is constantly censored or removed due to being considered overly sexual. There is no visual difference between the male and female nipple, yet the female nipple is over-sexualised and censored by Facebook and other Social Media platforms.
attributes.background: We want social media to treat male and female bodies equally when it comes to censorship and classification of nudity!

rejection.details:
Decisions about what content to allow on social media platforms are a matter for Ofcom and social media companies themselves, not the Government or House of Commons.

You might start a petition asking the Government to require social media companies to assess the equality of their rules on censorship.
